title: Beautiful 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom with gorgeous views! 1023 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Location:', '1669 Iris Drive SE - Conyers, GA 30013', 'Rental Information:', '$1619/Month | 2 Bedroom 2 Bath | 1023 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'More Information:', 'show contact info', 'What you’ll find in our community!', '➢ Barbecue Area', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Front Door Trash Pickup', '➢ Gated Community', '➢ Parking', '➢ Pet Friendly', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ 2 Community Playgrounds', '➢ 2 Sparkling Pools', '➢ 4 Common Picnic Areas with Barbeque Grills', '➢ Coffee Concierge', '➢ Controlled Gated Access', '➢ Courtesy Patrol', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Trash Pickup - Door to Door', 'Features in this apartment home!', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Microwave', '➢ Oven/Range', '➢ Spacious Closets', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Views', '➢ Fireplaces in Select Units', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Individual Climate Control', '➢ Newly Renovated with Black Appliances', '➢ Refrigerator/Freezer', '➢ Renovated Apartment Homes Available', '➢ Sunroom in Select Units', '➢ Upgraded Flooring in Select Units', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Call Woodland Trace at', 'show contact info', "The living spaces at Woodland Trace Atlanta are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.", "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Woodland Trace Atlanta.", "You'll love living in the Conyers location!", 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', '$300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', '*Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F2FFE56365114447']
